column4: *Stupid* question, modprobe -r removes and module, but in the man page -i says ignore install, how do I install a module?? (I know, lame)
modprobe -v module_name
-v is verbose, so really modprobe {module name} would work !!??
yes; plus it also tells you it worked
that's counter intuitive, thanks :)
you know, I did that before asking...I took the insmod line as an error!
duh
I told you it was lame :)
lame is an encoder :)
...then I encode lameness I guess
yw
now I want to tie that to my indicator applet, I'll be back if I have trouble.
heh, irssi notify with sound - pretty cool.
whats a rootkit information?
(no dash before dpkg) :)
my bad i wanted to use the dash as pointer ;)
